headline: Buy 5 Nuclear Energy Stocks Amid Massive AI-Powered Data Center Growth
summary: AI-driven data center demand is fueling a nuclear energy boom. D, DUK, AEE, ETR and PCG are five stocks poised to benefit from the surge.

headline: Dominion Energy (D) Valuation: Is the Recent Earnings-Driven Uptrend Justified?
summary: Dominion Energy recently posted upbeat annual results, with revenue up 6% and net income growing by nearly 10%. The stock has advanced 12% year to date and is attracting renewed attention from income-oriented investors. See our latest analysis for Dominion Energy. Dominion Energy’s 12% share price return so far this year is being noticed, especially as total shareholder return over the last twelve months hit 7.4%. That short-term upward momentum, combined with steady fundamentals, suggests...
